title: HAP 58 - A Common Circle - Anténor Firmin
itunes:title: HAP 58 - A Common Circle - Anténor Firmin
description: Haitian anthropologist Anténor Firmin debunks racist pseudo-science and argues that inequalities among humans are caused by social, not biological, factors.
content:encoded: Haitian anthropologist Anténor Firmin debunks racist pseudo-science and argues that inequalities among humans are caused by social, not biological, factors.
itunes:subtitle: Haitian anthropologist Anténor Firmin debunks racist pseudo-science and argues that inequalities among humans are caused by social, not biological, factors.
itunes:summary: Haitian anthropologist Anténor Firmin debunks racist pseudo-science and argues that inequalities among humans are caused by social, not biological, factors.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
